title: Struggling To Get Back Into This
body:
Lately ive been struggling to even play league , i dont really find enjoyment anymore and its also hard since all of my friends have quit league 

Has anyone ever felt like this if so what did you do to find the enjoyment back in the game ?

replies.body:
Try some of the other game modes you don't usually play, like ARAM. You might also try different champions that you never really bothered with. Make goals, such as ranking up, getting Mastery 5 on some champions, or unlocking more champs.

You can also sign up for [tournaments on the community page](http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/), or find new friends from the forums or throughout your games to group up with.

You might also just take a break. There's no real reason to play the game constantly; getting burned out or bored isn't uncommon. You could come back at any time later.

Add me if you want. I pretty much only play with friends. When we have t more than 5 on we usually play hide and seek or a custom vsing each other 4v4 etc.

I have been slack the last few days but i'm usually on every day with the exception to weekends.
